summary: So like a few others I went into entropy and realized that I might as well just build into elementarism since you can do just as much damage without the cost of your own health. So I made a file which tweaks the Entropy spells as I had imagined them.
descriptionHtml:
So like a few others I went into entropy and realized that I might as well just build into elementarism since you can do just as much damage without the cost of your own health. So I made a file which tweaks the Entropy spells as I had imagined them.

So the way I imagined entropy was a health-based High risk- High reward caster. So I buffed the damage by ~ 50% for Death spark and ~100% for Death Breath and lowered the base Mana cost by 50%.
Devour Soul has been buffed to absorb more health from dead enemies. Boosted to 25%/50%/75% up from 15%/20%/30%.

File comes as is with no support.

If you don't like the buffs you can edit them using TES5Edit.
author: TheFuzzler
